body:
> He is continuing his mis representation of multigeth as a legitimate source of truth for etc. it isnt.

Good point on his efforts to represent his writing as legimate sources of truth for Ethereum Classic. 

> I want to make it abundantly clear that my code and actions have nothing to do with ETC any more. ... just ask the person for first-hand direct-quote proofs...

Looking into this right now and I am still seeing Sorpaas represent CorePaper as a legitimate source of truth for ETC as noted by his discord vanity:
https://discord.io/ethereumclassic
https://imgur.com/a/B6frFC1

Quite the busy misinformation campaign when you look at the paper trail. Please audit his permissioned roles to mitigate further attacks by this individual. Sorpaas has demostrated a track record of committing torts to defame the Ethereum Classic network participants with the intention of causing financial loss. Sorpaas has proven multiple times that he will abuse his permissioned privledges to advance his own agenda at the expense of the project.
